flawed_nl_solution:
Vanessa needs $80 - $20 = $<<80-20=40>>40 to buy the dress.
She manages to gather $30 - $10 = $<<30-10=20>>20 each week
The number of weeks she has to wait is 40 / 20 = <<40/20=2>>2 weeks.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
